attributes.action: launch immediate efforts to remove the hazardous remains of SS Richard Montgomery in the Thames Estuary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls for the immediate removal of the hazardous remains of American ship SS Richard Montgomery that sunk in the Thames Estuary. The ship, which carried 1500 tons of explosives is a potential danger to passing ships and residents in the area.
